text: @SupraDarky I'll second your recommendation, because this was, by far, one of the best RPGs on the DS.  And I've played the majority of RPGs on all platforms.  I lied Nostalgia more than I did FFIII and FFIV for the DS.

text: You really should play it. It's great, there's a lot to do, and you can tell that a lot of love went into it.
author: jackal27

text: It's like... Early 1900's Tokyo.
author: jackal27

text:
It's a traditional RPG for the DS that takes place in the a version of the world that we live in as opposed to a fantasy setting. So while there may be airships and monsters, you'll be visiting places like New York and Tokyo. 

It's a really great game. If you like RPGs I would definitely recommend it.
author: jackal27

text:
I just beat this game last night! It's so great! There's so much to do!

The music really needs to be listened to with headphones. I started noticing instruments I didn't even know were there.
